page.title: 11SW BASINGSTOKE: HEALTH
page.content: The{Health Centre} is rather large because of the rapid growth of the Brighton Hill estate over the last decade. It contains 4 resident family doctors,several midwives and health visitors,a clinic for babies,2 nurses, a chiropodist,and a{dental surgery. There are three male and one female dentists at the surgery and treatment is mainly under the National Health Service. The nurses give injections, syringe ears,take out stitches and attend to other minor ailments. In the villages of Farleigh Wallop and Cliddesden{health visitors}play an important role.In emergencies a doctor can be contacted by phoning the clinic Aerobics and{ keep-fit} clubs are popular ways of improving one's health and classes are regularly held in halls and local schools.
